# title

**Instance Property**

A localized string that contains the name of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var title: String? { get }
```

## Providing Metadata About the Item

- **imageProvider**: An object that provides a visual representation of the item.
- **iconProvider**: An object that provides an icon that represents the item’s source.

items.description: An object that provides a visual representation of the item.
items.name: imageProvider

items.description: An object that provides an icon that represents the item’s source.
items.name: iconProvider

title: title
